skinImage.label: skinImage
skinImage.computedValue: {{(() => { const tableData = patientTable.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (API.baseUrl +  currentRow["skinImage"][0].url)) : API.baseUrl +  currentRow["skinImage"][0].url })()}}

actionConfiguration.body: SELECT * FROM kyc ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM kyc ORDER BY id ASC;

-- SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
-- FROM (
  -- SELECT generate_series(
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW() - INTERVAL '11 DAYS'),
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()),
    -- INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  -- ) as day
-- ) AS date_series
-- LEFT JOIN kyc 
-- ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
-- GROUP BY date_series.day
-- ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
FROM (
  SELECT generate_series(
    DATE '2023-03-19',
    DATE '2023-03-30',
    INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  ) as day
) AS date_series
LEFT JOIN kyc 
ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
GROUP BY date_series.day
ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

-- SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
-- FROM (
  -- SELECT generate_series(
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW() - INTERVAL '11 DAYS'),
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()),
    -- INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  -- ) as day
-- ) AS date_series
-- LEFT JOIN kyc 
-- ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
-- GROUP BY date_series.day
-- ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
FROM (
  SELECT generate_series(
    DATE '2023-03-19',
    DATE '2023-03-30',
    INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  ) as day
) AS date_series
LEFT JOIN kyc 
ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
GROUP BY date_series.day
ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE kyc
  SET first_name = {{inp_firstName.text}},
			last_name = {{inp_lastName.text}},
			email = {{inp_email.text}},
			phone = {{inp_phone.text}},
			address = {{inp_address.text}},
			date_of_birth = {{dat_dob.formattedDate}},
			status = {{sel_verificationStatus.selectedOptionValue}},
			comment = {{rte_comments.text || ''}}
  WHERE id = {{ tbl_kycList.selectedRow.Id }};

UPDATE kyc
  SET first_name = {{inp_firstName.text}},
			last_name = {{inp_lastName.text}},
			email = {{inp_email.text}},
			phone = {{inp_phone.text}},
			address = {{inp_address.text}},
			date_of_birth = {{dat_dob.formattedDate}},
			status = {{sel_verificationStatus.selectedOptionValue}},
			comment = {{rte_comments.text || ''}}
  WHERE id = {{ tbl_kycList.selectedRow.Id }};
SELECT * FROM kyc_document WHERE "user" = {{tbl_kycList.selectedRow.Id || '1'}};
SELECT * FROM kyc_document WHERE "user" = {{tbl_kycList.selectedRow.Id || '1'}};
